team.name: Dr. Wilmar Pereira dos Santos
team.bio: Lawyer with over 30 years of experience, specialized and holding a postgraduate degree in Civil Procedural Law. He works in Administrative Law and strategic public, procedural and environmental legal consulting. He served as Chief Prosecutor of the Planning and Environment department of the Municipality of Búzios.

team.name: Raphael Souza Fonseca
team.bio: Economist and entrepreneur, with a background at Ipiranga S/A, Grupo Abril, Mongeral Aegon, and Banco de Arbi. He has been active as a real-estate entrepreneur for 12 years.

team.name: Giovanna Guida da Cunha
team.bio: Architect with experience in major events (Rock in Rio, The Town, Parque dos Dinossauros, Parque das Aves) and currently working on the UN Climate Conference (COP) project in Belém, Pará.

team.name: Daniel Machado Magalhães de Almeida
team.bio: Advertising professional and entrepreneur in the gastronomy sector, with 21 years of experience in events, gastronomy and culture. He has led venues such as Aqua Bossa Lounge, Grupo Rayz, People and Devassa.

team.name: Armando Lito
team.bio: Bachelor in Administration from the Faculty of Political and Economic Sciences of Rio de Janeiro. He has managed PAN since June 1997 with a team of university students skilled in the cultural market and knowledgeable about the tax-incentive laws, ordinances and guidelines of the Ministry of Culture and Sports, as well as the State and Municipal Culture Secretaries. As Administration Manager he has worked on over 150 socio-cultural and sports projects (Espaço Tom Jobim, Rio Cena Contemporânea, Artcena, Rio International Cello Encounter, Interactive Circus Center, etc.).
